name: Charlotte's Dream v0.3
description:
Charlotte's Dream demo version v0.3, now with sound!

You play as Charlotte having an exciting dream of adventure. Plot details still to come.

Controls are:

Arrow Keys - Move

Double Tap Left/Right: Dash

Z: Jump

Up+Z: Uppercut

Down+Z: Power Slide

X: Attack

Up+X: Sub-weapon

Shift: Switch sub-weapons

Enter: Pause

EDIT: I sped Charlotte up: I sped her walk speed up a lot and her dash speed a little. Now you don't have to dash everywhere all the time if you want to jump over basically anything.
